q: CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting on 28 February. A 17 January statement by Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer emphasised Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. Microsoft finds itself locked in a fierce battle for CRM market share with Salesforce.com and Oracle, both of which have shown little hesitation in both updating their products and sniping at their rivals.

We'll see what happens over the next couple of months.

Simon Cowell let me sing ''Twinkle Twinkle Little Star' to him. He's so nice and I love him.'' Bethany passed away at a hospice the three days later. Simon Cowell 's spokesman Max Clifford said, He is really upset, he said what a beautiful little girl she was. He is just so sad, and sad for the whole family. She was a very special little girl and Simon Cowell was so touched when she sang for him... his heart goes out to Bethany's mum and dad and he is thinking of them. A spokesman for Bethany's family said, '''Her dad said that she had done what she always wanted to do, meet Simon Cowell and sing to him. She had achieved her big ambition and was now ready

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. ''It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . his director of communications, Andy Coulson this morning on Radio 4, refusing to comment on speculation that Andy Coulson had offered his resignation after mounting pressure over the News of the World phone-hacking scandal. with Unequal Technologies, a provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of this season. ''To sum it all up, the last five months, have been delayed gratification,'' Michael Vick said. Things that I wanted to accomplish the last couple years that I couldn't and I had to wait for it, and I had to be patient, and I did it and it all paid off. I just thank God for putting me with the right group of people, with Andy, with a flagship organization, a great group of coaches.... They give me all the credit, but I give them the credit. of a top-selling tabloid newspaper. Andy Coulson denies any knowledge of the hacking, but admitted on Friday he'd committed a cardinal sin for a back room operator- he became the story. Andy Coulson said continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 per cent needed in his role as Downing Street communications chief. ''I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on.''

said to Regis Philbin . ''I think it's a good idea. I think you're leaving at the top of your game.'' With David Letterman laughing, Martin Short pressed on with the obvious joke. It's a smart thing to do, because you've peaked, he said. And then he advised David Letterman to not ''come back like Sinatra.'' Though it was inevitable, the humor was lost when David Letterman inevitably set the record straight and Martin Short feigned ignorance.
